newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: Portugal fireworks factory explosion kills three.
newsitem.headline: Portugal fireworks factory explosion kills three.

text.p: An explosion at a fireworks factory killed three people and seriously injured another three in northern Portugal on Tuesday, a police spokesman said.
"There are three people dead and three seriously injured who have been taken to hospital. They haven't been identified yet and we don't know exactly what caused the explosion," the spokesman said.
The explosion occurred in the storage room of the factory close to the town of Guarda in the northern Serra da Estrela mountain range.
It started a fire that spread to a nearby forest but a spokesman for the local fire brigade said the blaze was under control.
